Do people need a lesson on how to rate these movies? 

10/10 is reserved for Blu-Ray (equivalent quality rips)

If it's not a crisp, solid rip why sit here and say that it is? Most of us don't NOT download something just because it's not perfect (if we don't care) but don't give it a higher rating just because it's best one available so far.

PS. This movie should be rated as follows:
V/7-8
A/5 (Cam Audio) 

**Pretty good for Cam Audio, but no where near a 10.
